Notes.Text:
This update for jetty-minimal fixes the following issues:

- jetty-minimal was upgraded to version 9.4.38.v20210224
  - CVE-2020-27223: Fixed an issue with Accept request header which might have led to Denial of Service (bsc#1182898).

Vulnerabilities.Description: In Eclipse Jetty 9.4.6.v20170531 to 9.4.36.v20210114 (inclusive), 10.0.0, and 11.0.0 when Jetty handles a request containing multiple Accept headers with a large number of “quality” (i.e. q) parameters, the server may enter a denial of service (DoS) state due to high CPU usage processing those quality values, resulting in minutes of CPU time exhausted processing those quality values.
